personal.name: Jane Smith
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.description: I build accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for the web.
personal.about: I'm a full stack developer with 5+ years of experience building web applications with React, Node.js, and other modern technologies. I'm passionate about creating accessible, user-friendly applications that solve real problems. When not coding, I enjoy hiking, reading sci-fi novels, and experimenting with new technologies.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experience.description: Led the frontend development team in designing and implementing user interfaces for enterprise applications. Improved site performance by 40% through code optimization and refactoring. Mentored junior developers and implemented code review processes.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained multiple client websites and web applications using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Collaborated with designers to implement responsive UI components. Reduced API response time by 30% through database optimization.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Worked on the company's main product interface using Vue.js and Vuex. Implemented new features and fixed bugs according to user feedback. Participated in agile development processes and sprint planning.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialized in Human-Computer Interaction and Web Technologies. Thesis on improving web accessibility for visually impaired users.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Dean's List, 3.8 GPA. Active member of the Computer Science Student Association.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product management, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment processing.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A Kanban-style task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, user authentication, and real-time updates.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A weather application that displays current conditions and forecasts for any location using geolocation or search.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: A web application for tracking workouts, setting fitness goals, and visualizing progress over time.
